author: FourFourTwo
description: Chelsea striker Michy Batshuayi feels he has learned a lot in what has not been an easy 2016-17 campaign.
title: Batshuayi convinced of progress despite Chelsea frustrations

author: FourFourTwo
description: Michy Batshuayi, Nathaniel Chalobah and Kenedy all start for Chelsea alongside captain John Terry against Watford.
title: Terry starts as Chelsea make nine changes for Watford
